fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Choose to fabricate a normal existence during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Tonight, you will learn all roles that can get notifications tonight related to their role and decide what notifications each of them gets for their abilities. If they are a role that has multiple abilities, you can write notifications for each ability and they will get the one that matches the ability they used.
You may only do this once.
Vampire Fixation: You gain another charge of your ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
